title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 264 - Separate Returns Of Nonresident Husband And Wife On A Single Form And Overpayment And Refund Shown Thereon
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 264 - Separate Returns Of Nonresident Husband And Wife On A Single Form And Overpayment And Refund Shown Thereon

State Regulations
§ 264.1 - Separate returns of nonresident husband and wife on a single form
§ 264.2 - Application of overpayment of tax by husband or wife
§ 264.3 - Refund of overpayment of tax by husband or wife
§ 264.4 - Application of sections 264.2 and 264.3 of this Part

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 264

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 697[a], 1342; Codes
and Ordinances of the City of Yonkers, §
92-113

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
